import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createProfile, getUserProfile} from '../../../actions/profileActs' const EditProfile = ({ profile: {profile, loading}, createProfile, getUserProfile, history }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ contry:'', city:'', street:'', day:'', month:'', year:'', when:'', how:'', what:'', favePet:'', otherProfiles: true, foroms:true, petForSale: true, adopters: true, genral:'', images:[], twitter:'', youtube:'', facbook:'', instagram:'' }) const [displaySocial, toggleSocial] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { getUserProfile() setFormData({ contry: loading ? '' : profile.location.contry, city: loading || !profile.location.city ? '' : profile.location.city, street: loading || !profile.location.street ? '' : profile.location.street, when: loading || !profile.loveToPet.when ? '' : profile.location.street, how:loading || !profile.loveToPet.how ? '' : profile.location.street, what:loading || !profile.loveToPet.what ? '' : profile.location.street, favePet:loading || !profile.loveToPet.favePet ? '' : profile.location.street, otherProfiles: loading || !profile.getDataOf.otherProfiles ? false : !profile.getDataOf.otherProfiles, foroms: loading || !profile.getDataOf.foroms ? false : !profile.getDataOf.foroms, petForSale: loading || !profile.getDataOf.petForSale ? false : !profile.getDataOf.petForSale, adopters: loading || !profile.getDataOf.adopters ? false : profile.getDataOf.adopters, genral: loading || !profile.genral ? '' : profile.genral, images: loading || !profile.images ? '' : profile.images.join(','), youtube: loading || !profile.social ? '' : profile.social.youtube, facbook: loading || !profile.social ? '' : profile.social.facbook, instagram: loading || !profile.social ? '' : profile.social.instagram }, [loading]) } ) const { contry, city, street, day, month, year, when, how, what, favePet, otherProfiles, foroms, petForSale, adopters, genral, images, twitter, youtube, facebook, instagram } = formData const makeNumOption =(start, end) =>{ const options =[] for (let i= (start); i <= (end); i++){ options.push() } return options } const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) const sentData = e =>{ e.preventDefault() createProfile(formData, history) } return (

)} const mapStateToProps = state => ({ profile: state.profile }) EditProfile.propTypes = { createProfile: PropTypes.func.isRequired, getUserProfile: PropTypes.func.isRequired, profile: PropTypes.object.isRequired } export default connect( mapStateToProps, {createProfile, getUserProfile}) (withRouter(EditProfile))
